actions.name: Temperamental

cost.trigger: The user declares a Electric, Fire or Ice-type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Electric, Fire or Ice-type attack.

Effect: The user may add the Type of the triggering attack to their own Types before the attack is initiated. The user retains as the triggering attack's Type for 5 Activations, they use Temperamental again, or they are switched out or @Affliction[fainted].
